org.mockito

接口 BDDMockito.Then<T>

  • 类型参数:
    T - type of the mock
    封闭类:
    BDDMockito

    public static interface BDDMockito.Then<T>
    Provides fluent way of mock verification.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.10.5
